solution_line_template: The proportion of plates that he has out of total states is {proportion_of_plates} because {plates_count} / {total_us_states} = <<{plates_count}/{total_us_states}={proportion_of_plates}>>{proportion_of_plates}
He has {percentage_of_plates}% of the plates because {proportion_of_plates} x {percent_multiplier} = <<{proportion_of_plates}*{percent_multiplier}={percentage_of_plates}>>{percentage_of_plates}
